title: Join the Waitlist for the PNW Components Silver Dropper Post
content:
PNW Components just informed us that their silver dropper posts will be landing later this summer in a limited batch. Don’t fret, you can be one of the first people to land one by signing up for the PNW Components email waitlist! Sign up at PNW Components.

There is no purchase obligation or anything; there just aren’t many of them coming, so you’ll get first dibs once they arrive.

The post Join the Waitlist for the PNW Components Silver Dropper Post appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
